en_text: The war is still going on.\NI'm already getting tired of it.
jp_text:
（キララ）
心配かけましたね コマチ

en_text: But it's the samurai\nwho are in good spirits.
jp_text:
（カンベエ）農民は皆
これを食って 土と戦ってきた
google_translated:
farmers are everyone
I ate this and fought with the soil

en_text: I think the longer the war goes on,\nthe happier they'll be about it.
jp_text:
わしらが戦で荒らした土地に
命を与えたのだ
google_translated:
On the land where I was ruined in battle
I gave my life

en_text: Are you guys really even human?
jp_text: その気概を思えばこそ―
google_translated: If you think of that feeling-

en_text: Apparently, they plan to settle everything\nduring this battle that is about to start.
jp_text:
この１杯をもってサムライは
水杯とする どうだ？
google_translated:
Samurai with this full cup
How is he to be a water craft?

en_text: It feels so good to issue\na decree like that!
akirameteta anata ni au made wa
kore wo ai to yobanai tosuru nara
And if this isn't what you call love,
jp_text: そうすれば野伏せりに勝てます
google_translated: If so, you can win the wild boat

en_text: then what is it you call love now?
jp_text: （カツシロウ）滝が ですか？
（ヨヘイ）見えねえだよ 全然！
google_translated: I can see it at all!

jp_text: （リキチ）来た 来た！　来たー！

en_text: I can definitely hear them.\NThey're mechanical samurai.

自分がこの城を
いかに攻め落とすかをな
google_translated:
I am this castle

en_text: Our army is still mostly farmers.
However, to the strategists, it\nis the best ally they could have.

カツシロウ
リキチの持ち場にお前も一緒に行け
google_translated:
Cutlet

en_text: They're here! They're here! They're here!
The Mimikuzu were a lot\ntougher than I imagined.

jp_text: ふん！　俺様が一番手だ！

en_text: I'm hit! I'm hit in the head!
jp_text: 当たったあ！　頭さ当たった～！

en_text: Kikuchiyo! Why aren't you at your post!?
You peasants think\nyou're able to use a gun!?
jp_text:
リキチ殿
生きて女房に会うのであろう？
google_translated:
Rikito
Are you living and meet the wife?

en_text: It looks like he broke some ribs.

雨は参りますね
思うように動けません
google_translated:
It will come to rain
I can not move as I think

en_text: Rikichi-dono, you've got to live\nto see your wife again, right?
jp_text: カンベエ様 紅蜘蛛では？

（キクチヨ）
てめえで しまいだあ！

en_text: You guys stay out of this.
To distinguish yourself as a warrior?
